description:
Wide range of speed from 0 to 1,500 rpm (Double microplate:0-1,000 rpm)

•  Excellent performance with electronic speed control

•  High speed and effective mixing for microplates

• With adapters for most popular vessels and microtiter plates

•  Used for various mixing applications with optional adapters

•  Maintenance-free brushless DC motor
PRODUCT PARAMETERS
Cat.No.
8031202000
Motion type
Orbital
Orbital diameter
4.5mm
Speed range
Single microplate: 0-1500rpm | Double microplate: 0-1000rpm
Speed display
Scale
Max. load capacity (with platform)
0.5kg
Motor type
Brushless DC motor
Motor rating input
18W
Motor rating output
10W
Power
20W
Voltage
100-240V
Frequency
50/60Hz
Dimension [D×W×H]
260×150×80mm
Weight
3kg
Permissible ambient temperature
5-40℃
Permissible relative humidity
80% RH
Protection class
IP20 MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Mixers in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Mixers with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
